articles.author: Catherine E. Shoichet
articles.title: More Baby Boomers are living alone. One reason why: ‘gray divorce’ - CNN
articles.description: Rising divorce rates for people over 50 are one reason why an increasing number of older Americans are living alone.
articles.content:
Edith Heyck didnt expect shed be 72 years old and living alone.
I always thought Id be married, she says. I was definitely raised to be a wife, and I never imagined Id be on my own.
Heyck, an artis… [+9735 chars]
